long_description: The new Black Diamond ATC-XP belay device offers the same great hold and stopping power as the original version, only it's now 30% lighter. ATC-XP features high-friction grooves that offer 3 times greater hold and stopping power than regular friction mode. Machined window through the body lightens up the device; ATC-XP weighs 64g. Black Diamond ATC-XP belay device accepts ropes from 7.7 to 11mm in diameter, making it suitable for everything from sport cragging to ice climbing.
short_description: The new Black Diamond ATC-XP belay device offers the same great hold and stopping power as the original version, only it's now 30% lighter.
